name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
"What is this doing?"
On May 30, Zhejiang Ningbo Textile and Garment Vocational and Technical College held a "Female Youth Health Education" lecture for freshmen, teaching girls how to attract men, how to arouse men's sexual desire, and how to put condoms on boys.
It caused discomfort to many students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, a piece of news that "Chinese representatives said in their speech at the 9th UN Convention on the Elimination of Discrimination against Women that China's constitution and laws do not discriminate against the LGBT community" has triggered ridicule from Chinese sexual minorities in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The last comment was cleared by the site.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Subsequent updates: The attackers were three police officers, including a deputy director of a police station. They have now been placed under administrative detention.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The song selection screen in the lobby of Xiaozhuang College asks students to "try not to select Korean and Japanese songs, and do not select English songs with unhealthy content."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added that in the game, "practice" became "practice*"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 31, a student from Shenzhen University jumped off a building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission
On May 31, a netizen mailed a book through SF Express and was asked to provide the name of the book for content review. Only if the "content is healthy" requirement was met could it be mailed

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 1, because Hunan Bubugao Company has been in arrears of wages for grassroots employees for several months, and employees' social security and medical insurance have not been paid for half a year. In the morning, employees from various stores went to the municipal government to petition, but were driven away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 29, Qingdao began to provide free nucleic acid testing

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 1, Apple App Store removed Baidu Cloud App

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of June 1, the Environmental Building of Nanchang University's Qianhu Campus caught fire.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 30, a senior student at Anhui University of Science and Technology committed suicide by jumping off a building, the reason being suspected to be that he failed the thesis defense.
